template.name: Template App Generic Java Script
template.description: 通过jps自动发现java应用，通过jstat获取关键指标

item_prototype.name: Number of young generation GC events {#PROGRAM_NAME} {#PID_NUMBER}

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template App Generic Java Script:java.status["{#PROGRAM_NAME}","{#PID_NUMBER}","all"].last(#2)}=1 and {Template App Generic Java Script:java.status["{#PROGRAM_NAME}","{#PID_NUMBER}","all"].diff()}=1
trigger_prototype.name: JVM is not available {#PROGRAM_NAME} {#PID_NUMBER}
